name: Chia Seeds
properties: Can be used in various dishes
Part of Daily Dozen nuts and seeds
benefits: Chia seeds are high in fiber and act as an appetite suppressant. They provide omega-3 fatty acids and can be added to smoothies, oatmeal, and baked goods. Part of the optimal weight-loss diet.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - 1 serving of nuts and seeds daily

quotes: In the Appetite Suppression section, we learned yet another reason to include ground flaxseeds in our daily diet.
